author: arfrever
msg: Polish translation update.
* subversion/po/pl.po: Polish translation update.

author: lgo
msg: (Hopefully) fix diff_tests.py 45 on Windows: while parsing the diff summarize
XML information convert separators from '\' to '/'. While there I cleaned up
the usage of variables a bit.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/actions.py
(run_and_verify_diff_summarize_xml): Fix typo in comment. Don't alias
expected_[paths|props] as modified_[paths|props]. Convert the path found in
the XML file from using os-native separators to '/'.

author: lgo
msg: Fix segmentation violation in the switch client code when switching to the root
of a repository.
Found by: Stefan Küng <tortoisesvn@gmail.com>
* subversion/libsvn_client/switch.c
(svn_client__switch_internal): Remove the 'Check to make sure that the switch
target actually exists.' code. This is now redundant since we use
svn_client__ra_session_from_path call to open the ra session.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/switch_tests.py
(switch_to_root): New test.
(test_list): Run the new test.

author: lgo
msg: Enable importing of state items in a specific path of an existing State.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/wc.py
(add_state): New function. Import state items at a certain path.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up r27754: fix the filters to actually work and make them more strict to
avoid changing svn:* properties twice and copying svn:sync properties.
* subversion/svnsync/main.c
(filter_include_svn): Remove function.
(filter_exclude_date_author): Rename to ..
(filter_exclude_date_author_sync): .. this. Fix strncmp's and dd svn:sync
filtering.
(filter_include_date_author_sync): New function.
(replay_rev_started, replay_rev_finished): use the new stricter filters.
